title: BMW plans to bring its first hydrogen car onto the market from 2028
description: BMW plans to launch its first hydrogen-powered vehicle in 2028, using fuel cell technology developed with Toyota. The vehicle will be an existing model with a hydrogen fuel cell drive option. BMW expects the hydrogen charging infrastructure to be significantly developed by then to support its plans.
